Gives you +12 armour |

all_class_powers.content:
## Description Blow it all away | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **OmniBlast**
-You explode causing 1d8 damage to everything around you. You can choose the damage type of the blast. |

all_class_powers.name: Disaster
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Indiscriminate firepower. | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Seismic**
-The land around you shakes causing enemies to fall prone and take 1d4 damage. They fall on a failed reflex check of 6. This affect happens to everyone but you in a 3 block radius. | | 1 | 1 | **Meteor**
-Summon a asteroid that falls on an enemy. The meteor does 1d20 damage to everything in a 20m radius. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Seismic**
-The land around you shakes causing enemies to fall prone and take 1d4 damage. They fall on a failed reflex check of 6. This affect happens to everyone but you in a 3 block radius.

**Meteor**
-Summon a asteroid that falls on an enemy. The meteor does 1d20 damage to everything in a 20m radius.

all_class_powers.name: Elemental Control
all_class_powers.description: Take full control of the elements
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Take full control of the elements | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Terrain Molder**
-You can make walls out of your element of choice.
-Fire: Deal 1d4 damage and cause burning when moved through
-Water: Slow movement by half when move through
-Earth: Can not be moved through and have 6 armor
-Air: Can not be moved or attacked through. Invisible. | | 1 | 1 | **Tentacles!**
-You can summon tentacles made out of your element. Can grapple enemies from a distance and keep then restrained.
-Water: Deal 1d4 true damage
-Fire: Deal 1d4 and cause burning
-Air: Deal 1d4 and are invisible
-Earth: Deal 1d6 and have 6 armor
| | 1 | 1 | **Elemental Blasts**
-You can fire blasts of your element that deal 1d6 damage and a bonus effect. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Terrain Molder**
-You can make walls out of your element of choice.
-Fire: Deal 1d4 damage and cause burning when moved through
-Water: Slow movement by half when move through
-Earth: Can not be moved through and have 6 armor
-Air: Can not be moved or attacked through. Invisible.

**Tentacles!**
-You can summon tentacles made out of your element. Can grapple enemies from a distance and keep then restrained.
-Water: Deal 1d4 true damage
-Fire: Deal 1d4 and cause burning
-Air: Deal 1d4 and are invisible
-Earth: Deal 1d6 and have 6 armor

**Elemental Blasts**
-You can fire blasts of your element that deal 1d6 damage and a bonus effect.

-You can control plants in a 10m radius |

-You don't produce any sound unless you want to. |

Silence
-You don't produce any sound unless you want to.

-You can shove things in a 10m radius backwards 5m
-You can do a smarts check instead of a strength check for any strength check. | | 1 | 1 | **Telekinesis**
-You can lift up to 3 objects or people in a 15m radius around you. |

all_class_powers.name: Mind Control
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Take Control | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Taunt**
-You force an enemy to focus on you for a turn. This is a free action. | | 1 | 1 | **Puppeteer**
-You make an enemies movement actions. Once per turn. | | 1 | 1 | **Suggestion**
-You gain +4 to a persuasion check with a chance of being detected. The check is a smarts check of 8. |

-You make an enemies movement actions. Once per turn.

**Suggestion**
-You gain +4 to a persuasion check with a chance of being detected. The check is a smarts check of 8.

## Description Mini Me | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Clone 1**

all_sub_powers.text:

-Once per turn order, you can make a roll into a double disadvantage |

-Once per turn order, you can make a roll into a double disadvantage

all_class_powers.name: Teleport
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Swapping Places | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Basic Teleport**
-You can teleport yourself 10m instead of taking a movement action. Does not need line of sight. | | 1 | 1 | **Exchange**
-You can swap the places of two people in line of sight not including yourself as an action. | | 1 | 1 | **Value Exchange**
-You can swap an item you are touching with one of less value as an action. They keep the other items speed. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Basic Teleport**
-You can teleport yourself 10m instead of taking a movement action. Does not need line of sight.

**Exchange**
-You can swap the places of two people in line of sight not including yourself as an action.

**Value Exchange**
-You can swap an item you are touching with one of less value as an action. They keep the other items speed.

all_class_powers.name: Cartoon
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Toon Force | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Rubber and glue**
You take have immunity to blunt damage |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Rubber and glue**
You take have immunity to blunt damage

all_class_powers.name: Elemental Body
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Rock Solid | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Rock Body**
-You can turn you body into stone. This gives you 2 armor and makes your melee attack a 1d6 | | 1 | 1 | **Water Body**
-You have resistance to slashing and piercing damage. | | 1 | 1 | **Flame Body**
-Your unarmed melee attacks cause you to deal stacks of burning. You gain immunity to fire damage. | | 1 | 1 | **Wind Body**
-Your jump height doubles and you take no fall damage. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Rock Body**
-You can turn you body into stone. This gives you 2 armor and makes your melee attack a 1d6

**Water Body**
-You have resistance to slashing and piercing damage.

**Flame Body**
-Your unarmed melee attacks cause you to deal stacks of burning. You gain immunity to fire damage.

**Wind Body**
-Your jump height doubles and you take no fall damage.

all_class_powers.name: Feral
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Werewolves and Vampires | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Cursed one basic**
You can switch to a mutated form that is visibly identifiable as an action. In this form you gain +1 to Ref ,Str and Armor but gain -1 to all other stats. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Cursed one basic**
You can switch to a mutated form that is visibly identifiable as an action. In this form you gain +1 to Ref ,Str and Armor but gain -1 to all other stats.

all_class_powers.name: Kaiju
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Stomp Stomp Stomp | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Monstrous Size**
-You become twice the size of a human
-Your size gives you +2 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 2 | 1 | **Gaint Size**
-You become four times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +4 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 3 | 1 | **Titanic Size**
-You become eight times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +8 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 4 | 1 | **Kaiju Size**
-You become sixteen times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +16 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 2 | 1 | **Breath Weapon**
-Gain an elemental breath (fire/acid/frost/lightning/toxin/etc.)
-Range: 20m cone (40m at Titanic/Kaiju size)
-Damage: 1d8 + Size bonus (+2/+4/+8/+16)
-Cooldown: 3 turns
-Element adds extra effects (fire burns terrain, frost slows, lightning chains, acid ignores armor, etc.) | | 2 | 1 | **Tail Growth**
-Grow a powerful tail capable of sweeping attacks-Tail Strike: 1d6 + STR bonus
-Reach: 10m (scales with size)
-Can attack behind you or hit flanking enemies
-Tail Sweep (1/fight): Cone around you; enemies make Reflex 5 or fall prone | | 2 | 1 | **Wings**
-Grow functional kaiju wings-Monstrous/Giant: long jumps & gliding-Titanic: flight at 20m/turn-Kaiju: flight at 50m/turn-Wingbeat Shockwind: enemies within 10m must make Reflex 5 or be pushed 5m-Immune to fall damage | | 2 | 1 | **Spine Cannons**
-Dorsal spines fire biological artillery
-Range: 100m
-Damage: 1d10 (charge for +1d10 next turn)
-Modes: Piercing (ignore 6 armor), Explosive (5m radius, 1d6), Scatter (3 targets, 1d4 each)
-At Kaiju size, shots can damage armored vehicles | | 2 | 1 | **Electrical Organs**
-Develop massive bioelectric organs
-Shock Aura: 1 damage to enemies who touch you
-Lightning Pulse: 15m, 1d8 lightning, chains to 1 target (Reflex 5 to avoid)
-Nova Discharge (1/scene): 10m radius, 2d8 lightning, stun 1 turn (Durability 6 negates)
-Immune to electricity | | 2 | 1 | **Rage Evolution**
-You mutate as you take damage
-Each turn you are damaged, choose one: +1 STR, +1 DUR, +5m reach, +1 damage, +2 temporary armor
-Max +5 per category
-If you hit max during the fight, enter **Rage Form**: +1d8 damage to all attacks Movement doubled Breath cooldown = 1 turn (if you have it) Tail Sweep no cooldown (if you have tail)
-After fight: lose buffs and take -1 Social until calmed |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Monstrous Size**
-You become twice the size of a human
-Your size gives you +2 strength when working on things smaller than you.

**Gaint Size**
-You become four times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +4 strength when working on things smaller than you.

**Titanic Size**
-You become eight times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +8 strength when working on things smaller than you.

**Kaiju Size**
-You become sixteen times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +16 strength when working on things smaller than you.

**Breath Weapon**
-Gain an elemental breath (fire/acid/frost/lightning/toxin/etc.)
-Range: 20m cone (40m at Titanic/Kaiju size)
-Damage: 1d8 + Size bonus (+2/+4/+8/+16)
-Cooldown: 3 turns
-Element adds extra effects (fire burns terrain, frost slows, lightning chains, acid ignores armor, etc.)

**Tail Growth**
-Grow a powerful tail capable of sweeping attacks-Tail Strike: 1d6 + STR bonus
-Reach: 10m (scales with size)
-Can attack behind you or hit flanking enemies
-Tail Sweep (1/fight): Cone around you; enemies make Reflex 5 or fall prone

**Wings**
-Grow functional kaiju wings-Monstrous/Giant: long jumps & gliding-Titanic: flight at 20m/turn-Kaiju: flight at 50m/turn-Wingbeat Shockwind: enemies within 10m must make Reflex 5 or be pushed 5m-Immune to fall damage

**Spine Cannons**
-Dorsal spines fire biological artillery
-Range: 100m
-Damage: 1d10 (charge for +1d10 next turn)
-Modes: Piercing (ignore 6 armor), Explosive (5m radius, 1d6), Scatter (3 targets, 1d4 each)
-At Kaiju size, shots can damage armored vehicles

**Electrical Organs**
-Develop massive bioelectric organs
-Shock Aura: 1 damage to enemies who touch you
-Lightning Pulse: 15m, 1d8 lightning, chains to 1 target (Reflex 5 to avoid)
-Nova Discharge (1/scene): 10m radius, 2d8 lightning, stun 1 turn (Durability 6 negates)
-Immune to electricity

**Rage Evolution**
-You mutate as you take damage
-Each turn you are damaged, choose one: +1 STR, +1 DUR, +5m reach, +1 damage, +2 temporary armor
-Max +5 per category 
-If you hit max during the fight, enter **Rage Form**: +1d8 damage to all attacks Movement doubled Breath cooldown = 1 turn (if you have it) Tail Sweep no cooldown (if you have tail)
-After fight: lose buffs and take -1 Social until calmed

all_class_powers.name: Mutate
all_class_powers.content:
## Description
It GROWS!

| LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY                                                 |
| ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| 1     | 1      | You gain +1 strength every two turns of combat up to 5  |
| 2     | 1      | You gain +1 strength every two turns of combat up to 10 |
| 3     | 1      | You gain +2 strength every two turns of combat up to 20 |
| 4     | 2      | You gain +4 strength every two turns of combat up to 20 |

all_sub_powers.text: You gain +1 strength every two turns of combat up to 5
You gain +1 strength every two turns of combat up to 10
You gain +2 strength every two turns of combat up to 20
You gain +4 strength every two turns of combat up to 20

## Description I'm made of plastic! It's fantastic | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Wildshape**
-You can take the forms of animals smaller than humans but bigger than bugs. These have to be real animals | | 1 | 1 | **Changeling**
-You can take the appearance of people you have seen before | | 1 | 1 | **Natural Tools**
-You can shift your body into tools and weapons on command |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Wildshape**
-You can take the forms of animals smaller than humans but bigger than bugs. These have to be real animals

**Changeling**
-You can take the appearance of people you have seen before

**Natural Tools**
-You can shift your body into tools and weapons on command

all_class_powers.name: Thistle
all_class_powers.content:
## Description The power to fight back | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | | 1 | 1 | **Shell**
-Enemies that attack you take 2 damage | | 1 | 1 | **Hunker Down**
-You can Hunker down as an action, Consuming all your movement and rooting you in place until your next turn. When in this state you gain 2 armor and when attack you deal 2 damage back. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Shell**
-Enemies that attack you take 2 damage

**Hunker Down**
-You can Hunker down as an action, Consuming all your movement and rooting you in place until your next turn. When in this state you gain 2 armor and when attack you deal 2 damage back.

all_class_powers.name: Vampire
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Bloodsucker | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Lifesteal**
-When you deal damage to an enemy heal for 4 health |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Lifesteal**
-When you deal damage to an enemy heal for 4 health

all_class_powers.name: Action Hero
all_class_powers.description: The powers of your average action movie protagonist
all_class_powers.content:
## Description The powers of your average action movie protagonist | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Hero's Limits**
-Every 3rd shot with a gun doesn't take ammo | | 1 | 1 | **Scene Maker**
-You can kick down doors with advantage | | 1 | 1 | **Last Stand**
You survive for 1 more turn after dying | | 2 | 1 | **Winner's Stand**
You can extend your time before dying by 1 if you kill an enemy |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Hero's Limits**
-Every 3rd shot with a gun doesn't take ammo

**Scene Maker**
-You can kick down doors with advantage

**Last Stand**
You survive for 1 more turn after dying

**Winner's Stand**
You can extend your time before dying by 1 if you kill an enemy

all_class_powers.name: Assassin
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Stealth and murder based powers | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Sneak Attack**
-You deal double damage when attacking from stealth | | 1 | 1 | **Move unseen**
-You gain advantage when sneaking | | 1 | 1 | **Traceless**
-You are untraceable unless you allow otherwise | | 1 | 1 | **Corpse Dust**
-Things you kill fade to ashes before disappearing completely | | 2 | 7 | **From Dust to Dust**
-When you kill something or someone you can make them be forgotten from peoples memories |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Sneak Attack**
-You deal double damage when attacking from stealth

**Move unseen**
-You gain advantage when sneaking

**Traceless**
-You are untraceable unless you allow otherwise

**Corpse Dust**
-Things you kill fade to ashes before disappearing completely

**From Dust to Dust**
-When you kill something or someone you can make them be forgotten from peoples memories

all_class_powers.name: Boomeranger
all_class_powers.content:
## Description It always comes back | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Boomerang**
Every item you throw can be returned to you. | | 2 | 1 | **Ricochet 1**
-Thrown items hit 2 enemies in range before returning |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Boomerang**
Every item you throw can be returned to you.

**Ricochet 1**
-Thrown items hit 2 enemies in range before returning

all_class_powers.name: Parry
all_class_powers.content:
## Description The power to get good | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --- | | 1 | 1 | **Basic Parry**
You can completely block an attack if you make a reflex check equal to the enemy roll -4 | | | 2 | 1 | **Reflect**
If you roll 2 higher than the enemy they take half the damage the attack would have done. | |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Basic Parry**
You can completely block an attack if you make a reflex check equal to the enemy roll -4

**Reflect**
If you roll 2 higher than the enemy they take half the damage the attack would have done.

all_class_powers.name: Swordsman
all_class_powers.content:
## Description The way of the sword | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Blade Warrior**
-You gain +2 to hit and damage when attacking with a bladed melee weapon | | 2 | 1 | **Blade Master**
-You gain advantage when attacking with a bladed weapon |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Blade Warrior**
-You gain +2 to hit and damage when attacking with a bladed melee weapon

**Blade Master**
-You gain advantage when attacking with a bladed weapon

all_class_powers.name: Wielder
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Powers for using items better | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 1**
-Items you touch gain 4 armour for 5 minutes | | 2 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 2**
-Items you touch gain 8 armour for 5 minutes | | 3 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 3**
-Items you touch gain 12 armour for 5 minutes | | 4 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 4**
-Items you touch gain 16 armour for 5 minutes |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Unbreakable Weapon 1**
-Items you touch gain 4 armour for 5 minutes

**Unbreakable Weapon 2**
-Items you touch gain 8 armour for 5 minutes

**Unbreakable Weapon 3**
-Items you touch gain 12 armour for 5 minutes

**Unbreakable Weapon 4**
-Items you touch gain 16 armour for 5 minutes

all_class_powers.name: Bio-Horror Techie 1
all_class_powers.description: The ability to make bio horror items
all_class_powers.content: The ability to make bio horror items

all_sub_powers.name: The ability to make bio horror Items

all_class_powers.name: Chemical Techie 1
all_class_powers.description: Gives you the ability make super chemicals
all_class_powers.content: Gives you the ability make super chemicals

all_sub_powers.name: Gives you the ability make super chemicals

all_class_powers.name: Divine Techie 1
all_class_powers.description: Lets you make super items with 2 different modes
all_class_powers.content: Lets you make super items with 2 different modes

all_sub_powers.name: Lets you make super items with 2 different modes

all_class_powers.name: Fire Techie 1
all_class_powers.description: Add a short description for Fire Techie.
all_class_powers.content: Add a short description for Fire Techie.

all_sub_powers.name: Firestarter Paste
all_sub_powers.description: A thick paste made of flammable materials that burn for a long time.
all_sub_powers.effects: Burns for 10 turns doing 1 damage per turn. Waterproof.

all_sub_powers.name: Flashfuel Bottle
all_sub_powers.description: A small capsule filled with a volatile liquid.
all_sub_powers.effects: Creates a 5m radius blast of light and fire. Deals 1d4 damage. Targets must make a reflex check of 5 or be blinded for 1 turn.

all_sub_powers.name: Basic Pyrotechnics Bench
all_sub_powers.description: A metal bench with ignition chambers, pressurized tanks, and controlled flame nozzles.

all_sub_powers.name: Incendiary Gel
all_sub_powers.description: A sticky gel that burns brightly
all_sub_powers.effects: Does 1d6 damage when thrown. Burns for 3 turns doing 1d4 damage a turn. Waterproof

all_sub_powers.name: Flame Nozzle
all_sub_powers.description: A weak flamethrower that can launch your chemicals further.
all_sub_powers.effects: Increases the effective range of your chemicals to 20m.

all_sub_powers.name: Flame Suit
all_sub_powers.description: A insulated suit filled with fireproof materials.
all_sub_powers.effects: Reduces taken fire damage by 4.

all_sub_powers.name: Thermite Bomb
all_sub_powers.description: A large bundle of vials and packages with wires coming out of it.
all_sub_powers.effects: Causes an 10m explosion that coats everything in range with thermite. Coated enemies take 1d10 fire damage per turn for 10 turns.

all_class_powers.name: Fortification Techie
all_class_powers.description: Add a short description for Fortification Techie.
all_class_powers.content: Add a short description for Fortification Techie.

all_sub_powers.name: Reinforced Bodysuit
all_sub_powers.description: A skintight bodysuit with reinforced inlays.
all_sub_powers.effects: Gain +2 armor.

all_sub_powers.name: Concrete Sprayer
all_sub_powers.description: A gun with a tank that constantly makes concrete.
all_sub_powers.effects: Allows you to build walls or seal of doors in 1 turn. The walls have 20HP and 3 armor.

all_sub_powers.name: Concrete Foam Grenade
all_sub_powers.description: A small tank to foam that can harden to the strength of rock.
all_sub_powers.effects: Seal 5m area in concrete. The foam has no armor and only has 10hp.

all_sub_powers.name: Fort Workbench
all_sub_powers.description: Allows you to build basic fortifications.

all_sub_powers.name: AutoTurret
all_sub_powers.description: A small gun turret that can be deployed in 1 turn.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp:5 Size: 1/2 slot Automatically attacks the nearest enemy. Damage: 1D4 Range: 50m

all_sub_powers.name: Duel Turret
all_sub_powers.description: A gun turret with 2 barrels. Takes 2 turns to deploy.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp:10 Size: 1/2 slot Automatically attacks the nearest enemy. Damage: 2D4 Range: 50m

all_sub_powers.name: Reinforced Wall
all_sub_powers.description: A upgrade to any existing wall to make it tougher to destroy.
all_sub_powers.effects: Increase a walls health to 50 and it armor to 6

all_sub_powers.name: Entrenching Tool
all_sub_powers.description: A hyper advanced digging tool.
all_sub_powers.effects: Allows the player to dig a cubic meter every turn.

all_sub_powers.name: Catapult Trap
all_sub_powers.description: A permanent stationary trap.
all_sub_powers.effects: Launches mooks/civvies up to 1d10 x10 meters if stepped on. Can only activate once per turn.

all_sub_powers.name: Tar Pit Trap
all_sub_powers.description: A permanent stationary trap
all_sub_powers.effects: If a person is standing on the trap, they lose half of their actions

all_sub_powers.name: Corrosive Gas Turret
all_sub_powers.description: A permanent stationary trap
all_sub_powers.effects: Releases Piranha juice on everything that passes it.

all_sub_powers.name: Fortified Basic Mech Suit:
all_sub_powers.description: HP: 50
all_sub_powers.effects: Movespeed: 15m per turn Armor: 2 Turret Slots: 2 Doubles production speed for bigger mechs. (Doesn't stack) Increases strength to 10. Too Bulky to use normal or mech weapons. There is 1/5 chance that enemies hit the player instead of the mech. You can't deploy turrets from inside the mech. If equipped with a quick deploy mod instead of 1 turret you can deploy turrets from inside.

all_sub_powers.name: Shoulder mounted Machine Gun
all_sub_powers.description: A Browning machine gun strapped to a auto aiming system.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 10 Size: 1 slot Range: 50m Targets Nearest enemy. Damage: 3d8

all_sub_powers.name: Size mod
all_sub_powers.description: Decreases the size of a turret by half.
all_sub_powers.effects: Halves size of a turret.

all_sub_powers.name: Quick Deploy Mod
all_sub_powers.description: Allows for quick Deployment of turrets.
all_sub_powers.effects: Allows for the deployment of two turrets a turn.

all_sub_powers.name: Turret Platform Drone
all_sub_powers.description: A large platform with propellers.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 20 This drone can carry 4 lv 1 turrets or 1 Lv 2 turret on it. It can also fly.

all_sub_powers.name: Emplaced Turret
all_sub_powers.description: A more permanent automatic defense. Stronger than the AutoTurret. Takes 1 hour to deploy.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp:20 Size: 1 slot Automatically attacks the nearest enemy. Needs 1 day to remove from emplaced position. Damage: 1D8 Range: 100m

all_sub_powers.name: Stealth Mod
all_sub_powers.description: Upgrade a turret to be stealthed while inactive.
all_sub_powers.cost: add half of price to item.

all_sub_powers.name: Armor Mod
all_sub_powers.description: Give a item 5 Hp and 5 armor.

all_sub_powers.name: Dart Trap
all_sub_powers.description: A permanent upgrade to a wall that lets it fire tranq darts.
all_sub_powers.effects: Automatically attacks any enemies that step in front of it. On a failed Durability roll of 5 the enemy is knocked out. Range: 20m

all_sub_powers.name: Hologram projector
all_sub_powers.description: A small device the size of a brick. Can create non-solid illusions.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp:5 Size: 1/2 slot Can project 1 non-solid illusion at a time. These illusions are destroyed if the projector is destroyed. Range: 100m

all_sub_powers.name: Fort Workshop
all_sub_powers.description: A upgrade to any room. Allows you to build more advanced turrets and fortifications.
all_sub_powers.effects: Allows for more advanced projects and fortifications.

all_sub_powers.name: AT Turret
all_sub_powers.description: A massive immoveable turret made to destroy vehicles.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp:50 Size: 1 slot Targets nearest enemy vehicle. Damage: 1D12 Range: 200m Ignores armor.

all_sub_powers.name: Artillery Turret
all_sub_powers.description: A massive gun that shoot to hit via an arc.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 30 Size: 1 slot Can only shoot at artillery markers. Fires upon a artillery marker when activated. Deals 1d6 damage in a 25m radius. Doesn't need line of sight to attack. Range: 1km

all_sub_powers.name: Artillery Marker
all_sub_powers.description: A hand sized device that activates the artillery turret.
all_sub_powers.effects: Is targeted by artillery turrets in range when activated. Allows for specifications when deployed by the tinker. Range: 1km

all_sub_powers.name: Lethal Mod
all_sub_powers.description: Adjusts Auto and Duel Turrets to use lethal bullets.
all_sub_powers.effects: Doubled the damage of a turret, but the turrets can now cause death by attacking.

all_sub_powers.name: Catapult Turret (small)
all_sub_powers.description: Launches loaded items.
all_sub_powers.effects: Size: 1 slot Range: 400m Damage: 1d8 Launches items.

all_sub_powers.name: Catapult Turret (large)
all_sub_powers.description: Launches loaded items.
all_sub_powers.effects: Size: 2 slots Range: 1km Damage: 1d20 Launches items.

all_sub_powers.name: Blazing Mod
all_sub_powers.description: Adjust a turret to cause burning on hit.
all_sub_powers.effects: Targets hit by a turret with this mod is set ablaze for 3 turns, causing 1d8 damage per turn. This damage is lethal.

all_sub_powers.name: Mech Deployment Canon
all_sub_powers.description: A massive Gun emplacement that can fire Basic mechs
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: 1km Allows the player to deploy a basic mech to a target in range.

all_sub_powers.name: Recall Mod
all_sub_powers.description: Allows the player to recall auto or dual turrets to him instantly.
all_sub_powers.effects: Effect when installed on a turret it allows the player to teleport turrets back to them.

all_sub_powers.name: Weakness Identifier mod
all_sub_powers.description: Allows the turret to find weaknesses in enemies,
all_sub_powers.effects: Adds a flat 4 damage to the turret it is installed on.
prerequisites: Interface Tinker Lv 2 and a active brain case.

all_sub_powers.name: Laser Turret
all_sub_powers.description: A industry grade laser mounted in a focusing lens.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 10 Size: 2 slots Range: Line of sight Damage:1d8 per turn

all_sub_powers.name: Forcefield Projector
all_sub_powers.description: A small device that gives a set target a forcefield when attacked.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 5 Size: 1 slot Range: 100m Blocks 5 attacks of any strength for a set target. Needs 1 hour to recharge after use.

all_sub_powers.name: Hardlight Projector
all_sub_powers.description: A device that allows the player to make solid illusions.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 5 Size: 1 slot Range: 100m Can create up to 5 solid illusions with 10hp and no armor.

all_sub_powers.name: Heavy Armor Mod
all_sub_powers.description: Allows the player to modify items with more hitpoints and some armor.
all_sub_powers.effects: Add 10 Hp to a item and give it 10 armor.
all_sub_powers.cost: Quadruple the cost of a item.

all_sub_powers.name: Burrow Mod
all_sub_powers.description: Allows the player to modify items to hide underground when not attacking.
all_sub_powers.effects: Item becomes invincible when not active.

all_sub_powers.name: Repair Drone
all_sub_powers.description: A drone that can heal your items.
all_sub_powers.effects: Repairs items in the room they are installed in. Heals 2hp every turn.

all_sub_powers.name: Laser wall/door
all_sub_powers.description: A wall or door made of deadly lasers. Need a access code to disable.
all_sub_powers.effects: Deals 10d10 damage to anything that tries to move past it.

all_sub_powers.name: Damage Mod
all_sub_powers.description: Doubles the damage of a item.
all_sub_powers.effects: damage of item 2x

all_sub_powers.name: Quick Deploy mod
all_sub_powers.description: Halves the deploy time of items.
all_sub_powers.effects: Halves the deploy time of items.

all_sub_powers.name: Only one of the following can be built.
B.L.A.M. Canon
all_sub_powers.description: Ballistic Landmark Assisted by Markers. An Utterly massive gun emplacement the size of a small building.
all_sub_powers.effects: Uses Artillery markers to get accurate coordinates for bombardment. Shells are Built separately. A shell does 10d10 damage to everything in a 200 meter radius. Shells Cost $10000 Range: 100km
prerequisites: Fort Workshop. Needs a buildings worth of space to build.

all_sub_powers.name: Technocrete
all_sub_powers.description: A upgrade for all concrete you make. Filled with titanium
all_sub_powers.effects: All concrete has 100hp and 10 armor.

all_class_powers.name: Gadget Techie 1
all_class_powers.description: Add a short description for Gadget Techie.
all_class_powers.content: Add a short description for Gadget Techie.

all_sub_powers.name: Add a short description for Gadget Techie.

all_class_powers.name: Interface Techie
all_class_powers.description: Add a short description for Interface Techie.
all_class_powers.content: Add a short description for Interface Techie.

all_sub_powers.name: Control Helmet
all_sub_powers.description: A helmet that pushes metal rods into the brain of the wearer. Lets them control Interface tech.
all_sub_powers.effects: Control Slots: 3 Allows the wearer to control compatible technology.

all_sub_powers.name: Hover Drone
all_sub_powers.description: Cheap but Expendable drones.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 2 Can fly. Item Slot: 1

all_sub_powers.name: Taser
all_sub_powers.description: A small cheap non-lethal weapon.
all_sub_powers.effects: Damage: 1d4 non lethal Range: 10m

all_sub_powers.name: Remote Workshop
all_sub_powers.description: A room that can be remote controlled to build items.
all_sub_powers.effects: Allows for the production of more advanced items.

all_sub_powers.name: Audiovisual Kit
all_sub_powers.description: Allows you to see and hear through you drones.
all_sub_powers.effects: Allows for sight and hearing through a equipped drone.

all_sub_powers.name: Car drone
all_sub_powers.description: A tiny car that can slip under doors.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 2 Fits under doors. Item slot: 1

all_sub_powers.name: Chemical Tank
all_sub_powers.description: A capsule that contains the players chemical of choice for chemical tinker catalogue.
all_sub_powers.effects: Can be attached to drones. Releases the chemical on command.

all_sub_powers.name: Turret drone
all_sub_powers.description: A small turret that runs on its legs.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 5 Damage: 1d4 per turn Range: 50m

all_sub_powers.name: Puppeteer Drone
all_sub_powers.description: A exoskeleton that can clamp to unwilling targets.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 10 Armor: 1 Can attach to unconscious human targets to puppet them around. Still active after their awake.

all_sub_powers.name: Roller Drone
all_sub_powers.description: Small ball like drones. They fit under doors.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp:4 Armor: 3 Can fit under doors. Can trip enemies that set on them.

all_sub_powers.name: Brain Extractor
all_sub_powers.description: A chair that looks suspiciously like a dentist chair.
all_sub_powers.effects: Removes brain from a target unconscious human and puts them in brain cases.

all_sub_powers.name: Brain Case
all_sub_powers.description: A jar with life support systems.
all_sub_powers.effects: Sustains a contained brain. Can be equipped with a Audiovisual system and a Control Helmet.

all_sub_powers.name: Control booster
all_sub_powers.description: Lets you set automatic commands for drones.
all_sub_powers.effects: When equipped to a brain case with a brain. It lets the player set automatic controls for up to 10 drones.

all_sub_powers.name: Case Carrier
all_sub_powers.description: A set of tank tracks with a drone controller.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 10 Movespeed: 5m per turn Can carry 1 brain case and move it freely.

all_sub_powers.name: Hypnotizer
all_sub_powers.description: A ray gun that affects the targets brain.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: 10m Roll 1d10, on a 8 or higher a mook is hypnotized and falls unconscious.

all_sub_powers.name: Brain Clone
all_sub_powers.description: Wipe the memories of a brain and implant your own.
all_sub_powers.effects: Gives the player a second chance at live if they die. Stays inactive until current brain expires.

all_sub_powers.name: Nerve Disruptor
all_sub_powers.description: Causes paralysis in a target creature.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: 20m Damage: None Causes paralysis in target enemy on a roll higher than 5.

all_sub_powers.name: Knockout Gas
all_sub_powers.description: A very potent necrotic in gas form.
all_sub_powers.effects: Effect Single use. Knocks out every one in a 5m radius unless they roll higher than 8 on a durability check.

all_sub_powers.name: Disrupter turret
all_sub_powers.description: A turret equipped with a nerve disrupter.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: 20m Automatically targets enemies nearby. Causes paralysis in target enemy on a roll higher than 5.

all_sub_powers.name: Mecha Carrier
all_sub_powers.description: A bipedal mech that can carry brains.
all_sub_powers.effects: Hp: 100 Armor: 4 Weapon Slots: 1 Gain all original stats. Allows brains to use hands. Can use mech weapons.

all_sub_powers.name: Neural Chips
all_sub_powers.description: A chip that can be implanted in unsuspecting people.
all_sub_powers.effects: Take control of a mook or civvy over a 12 hour period.

all_class_powers.name: Mech Techie
all_class_powers.description: Add a short description for Mech Techie.
all_class_powers.content: Add a short description for Mech Techie.

all_sub_powers.name: Bodysuit
all_sub_powers.description: A skintight bodysuit that doesn't provide any protection. Makes you look slightly cooler. Necessary to use any of the mechs.

all_sub_powers.name: Big Pistol
all_sub_powers.description: A Comically large pistol that can be stored inside mechs as a emergency sidearm.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: 10m Damage: 1D10

all_sub_powers.name: Mech Rifle
all_sub_powers.description: A massive gun that is made to be used by the mechs. The gun can still be used by people but only as a 2 handed weapon.
all_sub_powers.effects: Damage: nD10 n = to the size of the mech that is being used. n = 1 is no mech. Range: 100m

all_sub_powers.name: Ram
all_sub_powers.description: A melee weapon that can take a beating. Mostly made of cheap materials like concrete and metal.
all_sub_powers.effects: Damage: 1D6 + Strength Range: Touch

all_sub_powers.name: Mech Workbench
all_sub_powers.description: A bench with tools to build cheap mechsuits and better weapons. Needs 1 hour to pack or unpack.

all_sub_powers.name: Basic Mechsuit
all_sub_powers.description: A small mechsuit that seats 1 person and still fits through normal doors. Basically just there to help build bigger mechs or carry heavy objects/weapons.
all_sub_powers.effects: HP: 50 Movespeed: 15m per turn Armor: 1 Weapon slots: 2 Doubles production speed for bigger mechs. (Doesn't stack) Can carry Mech weapons one handed. Increases strength to 10. There is a 1/4 chance that the enemy hits the player instead of the mech.

all_sub_powers.name: Flamethrower
all_sub_powers.description: A barrel to launch liquid pain at your enemies with.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range:10m Damage: 1d4 in a 10m cone. Causes burning. Burning deals 1 damage per turn.

all_sub_powers.name: Shield
all_sub_powers.description: A massive Metal slab welded to the arm of a mech.
all_sub_powers.effects: Weapon slots: 1 +1 armor to your mech.

all_sub_powers.name: Rotary Concrete Foam Launcher
all_sub_powers.description: A grenade launcher that fires Concrete foam grenades.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: 50m Launches Concrete foam grenades.

all_sub_powers.name: Mech Sprayer
all_sub_powers.description: A massive hose like sprayer built into a mech.
all_sub_powers.effects: Uses a Weapon slot. Allows the mech to contain and spray chemicals safely.

all_sub_powers.name: Mulcher Mod
all_sub_powers.description: A grinding mouth device that grinds organic waste into bio slurry.
all_sub_powers.effects: Turns organic waste into random bio-samples

all_sub_powers.name: Rocket Launcher
all_sub_powers.description: A one time use weapon that fires unguided rocket. The rocket can be replaced during a short rest.
all_sub_powers.effects: Amount: n. n = to the size of the mech that is being used. n = 1 is no mech. Damage: 1D20 in a 5m radius. Range: 200m

all_sub_powers.name: Grapple hook Cannon**
all_sub_powers.description: A grappling hook that can only be equipped on basic mechs. Allows the mech to traverse up walls. Can also be used to drag enemies to you.
all_sub_powers.effects: Damage: 1D4 Range: 100m Allows mech to move up walls and buildings.

all_sub_powers.name: Armor Mod
all_sub_powers.description: A upgrade to a mechsuit that takes away 1 weapon slot, but increases the armor of a mech by 2

all_sub_powers.name: **Mech Transformation Mod
all_sub_powers.description: ** For 1 weapon slot you can make a mech have the ability to turn into a car.
all_sub_powers.effects: The mech can now turn into a car.

all_sub_powers.name: **Mech Bay
all_sub_powers.description: **A upgrade that can be made to any building that a car can enter or leave. Allows for the construction of bigger mechs and better weapons.

all_sub_powers.name: Novice Mechsuit
all_sub_powers.description: A mechsuit that seat 1 person. The size of a car. This mechsuit is built for more than just support and it shows.
all_sub_powers.effects: HP: 100 Movespeed: 10m per turn Armor: 3 Weapon slots: 3 Increases strength to 15.

all_sub_powers.name: Laser Cannon
all_sub_powers.description: A Massive laser cannon that has unlimited range.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: Vision Damage: 1D10 Double damage to unarmored targets.

all_sub_powers.name: Drill
all_sub_powers.description: A Drill that can be used by mechs. Allows for the construction of underground complexes. Can be used as a improvised mellee weapon.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: Touch Damage: nD10 damage. n= the level of mech being used. n = 1 is no mech. Allows for the digging of tunnels and underground chambers.

all_sub_powers.name: Trophy System
all_sub_powers.description: A small laser system that destroys up to 3 physical ranged attacks every turn. Takes up 1 weapon slot.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: 100m Damage: None Can destroy up to 3 physical ranged attacks per turn.

all_sub_powers.name: Cargo Bay Mod
all_sub_powers.description: A system that allows the mech to carry another person or something of similar size. Takes up 1 weapon slot.
all_sub_powers.effects: Allows a Mech to carry something inside of it.
prerequisites: Mech Bay; Mech must be bigger than basic.[br]

all_sub_powers.description: **Mechs for dummies:**A manual that after being used allows for another person to use the mechs.
all_sub_powers.effects: allows 1 person to be able to use mechs. **** Flight Mod: A mod that allows your mechs to fly. Allows any mech to have vertical movement

all_sub_powers.description: Massive Mech Bay: A Building that needs to be built underground or in a big warehouse. It allows for the production of the biggest mechs and Strongest weapons.

all_sub_powers.name: Advanced Mech
all_sub_powers.description: A massive 1 person mech. As big as a small building.
all_sub_powers.effects: HP: 1000 Movespeed: 20m per turn. Armor: 10 Weapon Slots: 5 Increases your strength to 50

all_sub_powers.name: MIRV Missle launcher
all_sub_powers.description: A massive cluster bomb launcher that saturates a massive area with explosions.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: 1km Damage: Hits every target within 250m radius of targeted area for 1D10 damage.

all_sub_powers.name: Gatling Gun
all_sub_powers.description: A gun that shoots bullets at a ridiculous speed.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: 200m Damage: 2nD4 n = to your mech level. n = 1 is no mech.

all_sub_powers.name: Mech Dropship
all_sub_powers.description: A aircraft that can carry up to 10 basic mechsuits.
all_sub_powers.effects: Movespeed: 100m per turn HP: 150 Armor: None Weapon slot: 1 Can carry up to 10 basic mechsuits.

all_sub_powers.name: Thermite Cannon
all_sub_powers.description: A gun that fires thermite that deals damage per turn.
all_sub_powers.effects: Damage: 1D8 per turn for 10 turns. Range: 200m

all_sub_powers.name: Potable Shield Projector
all_sub_powers.description: A force field projector that can be used for area denial by deploying walls.
all_sub_powers.effects: HP:20 Allows the mech to project up to 3 walls with 20 hp each.

all_sub_powers.name: Ai Mod
all_sub_powers.description: Allows a mech to control itself
all_sub_powers.effects: The Player can control any mech with this mod from another mech.

all_sub_powers.name: Chest Mounted Mass Driver
all_sub_powers.description: A massive Railgun built into the chest of a mech.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: Vision Damage: 1D100 Can only be fired once a day.

all_sub_powers.name: Only one of the following can be built.[br]
Mech Titan
all_sub_powers.description: A Massive Mech the size of a skyscraper.
all_sub_powers.effects: Movespeed: 50m per turn HP: 1000 Armor: 20 Weapon Slots: 10 This Mech has to be built underground. When it emerges it destroys anything above it.
prerequisites: Built underground, Only one can exist.[br]

all_sub_powers.name: Mechanical Mecha Workshop
all_sub_powers.description: A entire workshop on legs. Counts as a Massive Mech Bay, Mech Bay and Mech Workbench.
all_sub_powers.effects: Movespeed: 50m per turn. HP: 1000 Armor: 20 Weapon slot: 2 This mech can carry any amount of other mechs and rapidly deploy them.

all_class_powers.name: Modular Items Techie
all_class_powers.description: Add a short description for Modular Items Techie.
all_class_powers.content: Add a short description for Modular Items Techie.

all_sub_powers.name: Short Barrel
all_sub_powers.description: A small barrel that helps with quick draw.
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: 10m Damage: 1d6 You can switch to this weapon as a free action

all_sub_powers.name: Split Shot
all_sub_powers.description: A mod that splits bullets into a scatter effect.
all_sub_powers.effects: Damage: 1d4 Your attacks are split randomly across all the enemies in a cone.

all_sub_powers.name: Stabilizer Grip
all_sub_powers.description: A gyroscope built into the handle of the weapon.
all_sub_powers.effects: Consecutive attacks against the same enemy give +1 to hit.

all_sub_powers.name: Shock Battery
all_sub_powers.description: A battery that discharges to stun the enemy
all_sub_powers.effects: Range: Melee Once per turn. You stun an enemy on hit with a dc 6 durability save

all_class_powers.name: Self Augment Techie
all_class_powers.description: Add a short description for Self Augment Techie.
all_class_powers.content: Add a short description for Self Augment Techie.

all_class_powers.name: Water Techie
all_class_powers.description: Add a short description for Water Techie.
all_class_powers.content: Add a short description for Water Techie.

all_sub_powers.name: Hydro Gloves
all_sub_powers.description: A pair of rubberized gloves with micro-pumps and moisture collectors.
all_sub_powers.effects: **Cost:** $10 **Effect:** Lets you extract water from the air or liquids. Produces up to **1 liter per turn**. Reduces taken water/cold damage by 1. **Requirements:** None

all_sub_powers.name: Slickfoam Capsule
all_sub_powers.description: A capsule filled with expanding slick-foam.
all_sub_powers.effects: **Cost:** $10 **Effect:** Creates a **5m patch** of hyper-slippery foam. - Anyone moving through must roll Reflex 5 or fall prone. - Foam lasts 5 turns. **Requirements:** None

all_sub_powers.name: Chillburst Vial
all_sub_powers.description: A vial of fast-evaporating cryo-fluid.
all_sub_powers.effects: **Cost:** $50 **Effect:** On breaking, creates a **5m burst of freezing mist**. - Deals **1d4 cold damage**. - Reflex 5 or movement is halved for 1 turn. **Requirements:** None

all_sub_powers.name: Basic Hydromechanics Bench
all_sub_powers.description: A reinforced metal bench with pumps, pressure lines, freeze chambers, and filters.
all_sub_powers.effects: **Cost:** $100 **Requirements:** None

all_sub_powers.name: Cryo Slush Grenade
all_sub_powers.description: A metal sphere filled with rapidly expanding cryo-slush.
all_sub_powers.effects: **Cost:** $100 **Effect:** On detonation creates a **5m frost patch**. - Immediate **1d6 cold damage** - Targets must pass a Durability 5 check or take **1d4 cold damage for 3 turns** **Requirements:** Basic Hydromechanics Bench

all_sub_powers.name: Pressure Nozzle
all_sub_powers.description: A high-pressure sprayer attachment for projecting chemicals.
all_sub_powers.effects: **Cost:** $1000 **Effect:** Increases range of your liquids and chemicals to **20m**. **Requirements:** Basic Hydromechanics Bench

all_sub_powers.name: Insulated Diving Suit
all_sub_powers.description: A heavy-duty diving suit with internal pressure equalization.
all_sub_powers.effects: **Cost:** $1000 **Effect:** - Reduces taken **cold and water damage by 4** - Allows underwater breathing for **1 hour** **Requirements:** None

all_sub_powers.name: Water Lance Charge
all_sub_powers.description: A hydraulic explosive that releases a compressed jet of cutting water.
all_sub_powers.effects: **Cost:** $1000 **Effect:** Creates a **10m linear water blast**. - Deals **2d6 cutting damage** - Ignores **2 armor** - Pierces through soft cover **Requirements:** Basic Hydromechanics Bench
